find_indexes[source]

find_indexes(instrument:str)

Find existing indexes for an instrument.

Parameters:

  • instrument : <class 'str'>

    Dotted mission.instrument key, e.g. cassini.iss

Returns:

  • <class 'list'>

    List of configured index names

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
find_indexes("cassini.iss")

['index', 'inventory', 'moon_summary', 'ring_summary', 'saturn_summary']
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_index[source]

get_index(instr:str, index_name:str)

Example: get_index("cassini.iss", "index")

Parameters:

  • instr : <class 'str'>

    Dotted instrument index, e.g. cassini.iss

  • index_name : <class 'str'>

    Index name, for exmample 'moon_summary'

Returns:

  • <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>

    The PDS index convert to pandas DataFrame

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
instr = "cassini.iss"
index_name = "moon_summary"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
index = get_index(instr, index_name)

Stored index is up-to-date.
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
index = get_index("cassini.iss", "ring_summary")

Stored index is up-to-date.

find_instruments[source]

find_instruments(mission:str)

Find existing instruments for a mission.

Parameters:

  • mission : <class 'str'>

    Mission string, e.g. "cassini"

Returns:

  • <class 'list'>

    List of configured instrument names

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
find_instruments("cassini")

['iss', 'uvis']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
find_instruments("mro")

['hirise', 'ctx']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def refresh_index(
    instr: str,  # Dotted instrument index, e.g. cassini.iss
    index_name: str,  # Index name, for exmample 'moon_summary'
    download: bool = False,  # also refresh dowload, not only HDF conversion
):
    """Example: get_index("cassini.iss", "index")"""
    index = Index(instr + ".indexes." + index_name)
    if download:
        index.download(force_update=True)
    else:
        index.convert_to_parquet()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
refresh_index("cassini.uvis", "index")

Done.
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = get_index("cassini.uvis","index")

Stored index is up-to-date.
